title: Adobe ExperienceEvent - Email Message Interaction Details
description: Email-specific metadata and threading information for message interactions

xdm:subject.title: Email Subject
xdm:subject.description: Subject line of the email message.

xdm:messageId.title: Message ID
xdm:messageId.description: The Message-ID header value of the message, uniquely identifying this message in email threading.

xdm:inReplyTo.title: In Reply To
xdm:inReplyTo.description: The In-Reply-To header value, containing the Message-ID of the original message being replied to.

xdm:references.title: References
xdm:references.description: The References header value, containing the chain of Message-IDs in the conversation thread.
